Package com.larashores.laraspipes.utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.larashores.laraspipes.utils.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Collection of various status methods for use by other classes.

    static List<net.minecraft.core.Direction>
    getDirections(net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
    Given a direction, returns a list of all directions sorted relative to the specified direction in this order: the direction, left of the direction, right of the direction, above the direction, below the direction, and the opposite direction.

      public Utils()

  • Method Details

    • getFacingChest

      public static net.minecraft.world.Container getFacingChest(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Given a Level and BlockPos, checks to see if there is a Block with a FACING property. If so, checks to see if there is a Chest in the direction the Block is facing and returns its container if so.
      Parameters:
      level - The level the BlockPos belongs to.
      pos - The BlockPos to check for adjacent chests from.
      Returns:
      The container of the adjacent chest.

    • transferItems

      public static void transferItems(Set<net.minecraft.world.item.Item> filters, net.minecraft.world.Container from, net.minecraft.world.Container to)
      Transfers as many items as possible from a source container to a destination chest.
      Parameters:
      filters - If specified, only transfers items in the set of filters. Otherwise, transfers all types of items.
      from - The container to remove items from.
      to - The container to transfer items to.

    • getRotation

      public static ScreenRotation getRotation(net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Returns the amount of rotation needed to turn a south facing block to face a direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to face.
      Returns:
      The x and y degrees needed to rotate the block to face the specified direction

    • getDirections

      public static List<net.minecraft.core.Direction> getDirections(net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Given a direction, returns a list of all directions sorted relative to the specified direction in this order: the direction, left of the direction, right of the direction, above the direction, below the direction, and the opposite direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The sort direction.
      Returns:
      List of directions sorted by the specified sort direction.
